title: Optimize Consumer Group Rebalancing
summary: Introduces a new algorithm to improve the efficiency of consumer group rebalancing, reducing downtime during partition reassignment.

title: User Interaction Stream Processor
summary: Implements a stream processor to analyze and feed user interaction data back into Kafka topics for real-time analytics.

title: Enhanced Stream Partitioning for Real-Time Analytics
summary: Introduces advanced partitioning strategies to optimize real-time data stream processing and improve throughput.

title: Topic-Level Data Compression
summary: Introduces a configurable compression mechanism at the topic level to optimize storage and improve throughput.

title: Automated Topic Retention Adjustment
summary: Introduces a feature to automatically adjust topic retention policies based on usage patterns.

title: Time-Series Data Misinterpretation in Streams
summary: Incorrect time-window aggregation in Kafka Streams leads to misleading analytics results for users.

title: Data Lag in Consumer Groups
summary: Consumers experience delays in receiving messages due to synchronization issues, affecting real-time data processing.

title: Inaccurate Consumer Lag Metrics
summary: Users report incorrect consumer lag metrics, leading to misinformed scaling decisions.
